posts.post_content:
Hello

I only have around have around 10 so far 
so i'm looking for pretty much anyone preferably graded.
if anyone has a lot of graded commons id be very interested.

also if anyone could give me an idea on what i should be paying on ebay for

SGC 10-20-30-40's and lower PSA commons.

I really have no frame of reference with these cards and was sent here hoping i could find some help

thanks 
Dan

...to sell you, but in terms of price, I usually go by the general price line for no-name/not special commons:

SGC 10 - $10 - $15
SGC 20 - $20 - $25
SGC 30 - $25 - $35
SGC 40 - $35 - $40
SGC 50 - $45 - $50
SGC 60 - $70 - $90

Things have been somewhat recessed, so to speak, over the last year or two.  Sometimes you can do better than these prices, but I think they're probably a safe range.

Good luck!

Hello.  I just wanted to say thanks. 
I've picked up a bunch of cards already and on a personal note I haven't had much fun collectiing in a long time and the people on this board are really a kind helpful bunch of people 
So thanks to everyone and its really nice to have the itch again 
Dan
